publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2500 Margaret Smith: Community Care and Health (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Health and Community Care Committee considers the Community Care and Health (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 8 and 9, sections 10 to 14, sections 15 to 18, sections 1 to 7, sections 19 to 22, the schedule, sections 23 and 24.
